snippet: Federal prosecutors say a North Carolina man has been convicted of punching the ambassador of Gabon at a demonstration last December at the country’s embassy in Washington.
abstract: Federal prosecutors say North Carolina man Leon Obame has been convicted of assaulting ambassador of Gabon, Michael Moussa-Adamo, during a December 2011 demonstration at country’s Washington embassy.
lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors say a North Carolina man has been convicted of punching the ambassador of Gabon at a demonstration last December at the country’s embassy in Washington.
